description: List all tags on an Amazon DynamoDB resource. You can call ListTagsOfResource up to 10 times per second, per account. For an overview on tagging DynamoDB resources, see Tagging for DynamoDB in the Amazon DynamoDB Developer Guide.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon DynamoDB resource with tags to be listed. This value is an Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags currently associated with the Amazon DynamoDB resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the tag. Tag keys are case sensitive. Each DynamoDB table can only have up to one tag with the same key. If you try to add an existing tag (same key), the existing tag value will be updated to the new value.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the tag. Tag values are case-sensitive and can be null.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If this value is returned, there are additional results to be displayed. To retrieve them, call ListTagsOfResource again, with NextToken set to this value.
